analyzed: @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ar+ya ga na pa ti tshin+ta rad na/_bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshhogs kyi bdag po yid bzhin nor bu'i sgrub thabs/_'jig rten
translated: In Sanskrit: Ārya-gaṇapati-cintāmaṇi🔽In Tibetan: The Noble Wish-Fulfilling Gem of the Lord of the Ganas🔽Homage to Avalokiteśvara, the powerful lord of the world!

original: dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/tshhogs kyi bdag po sgrub pa la/
analyzed: dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/tshhogs kyi bdag po sgrub pa la/
translated: In the practice of the Lord of the Ganas,

original: zhi ba dang /_khro bo gnyis las 'di zhi bar sgrub pa'o/_/gnas dben par
analyzed: zhi ba dang /_khro bo gnyis las 'di zhi bar sgrub pa'o/_/gnas dben par
translated: there are two [aspects]: peaceful and wrathful. This is the peaceful practice.🔽Sit in an isolated place,

original: 'dug te/_man+dal khru gang gru bzhir byas la/_ba'i rnam lngas chag chag byas/🔽dbus su me tog dkar po'i tshhom bu dgod/_tshhogs kyi bdag po'i bris sku'am/
analyzed: 'dug te/_man+dal khru gang gru bzhir byas la/_ba'i rnam lngas chag chag byas/ dbus su me tog dkar po'i tshhom bu dgod/_tshhogs kyi bdag po'i bris sku'am/
translated: make a one-cubit square maṇḍala, sprinkle it with the five cow products,🔽and place a heap of white flowers in the center.🔽Arrange a painted image or a clay image of the Lord of the Ganas.

original: lugs sku gang rung cig bzhugs su gsol/_la phug dang la du las byas pa'i
analyzed: lugs sku gang rung cig bzhugs su gsol/_la phug dang la du las byas pa'i
translated: Make a maṇḍala from radish and garlic,

original: gtor ma bzang du bshams la/_gtor gzhong dang /_gtor mas nam mkha'
analyzed: gtor ma bzang du bshams la/_gtor gzhong dang /_gtor mas nam mkha'
translated: and imagine that the torma vessel and the torma fill the whole sky,

original: khengs pa/_ro mchog brgya dang ldan pa'i zhal zas su byin gyis brlabs la bzhag/
analyzed: khengs pa/_ro mchog brgya dang ldan pa'i zhal zas su byin gyis brlabs la bzhag/
translated: and that the food and drink are blessed to have the best of tastes.

original: de nas rang yi dam gyi lhar bsams pa'i mdun du/_pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du/🔽'phags pa tshhogs kyi bdag po yid bzhin nor bu'i sgrub thabs/
analyzed: de nas rang yi dam gyi lhar bsams pa'i mdun du/_pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du/ 'phags pa tshhogs kyi bdag po yid bzhin nor bu'i sgrub thabs/
translated: Then, in front of yourself visualized as the yidam deity, on a lotus and moon,🔽is a white ga syllable, as white as a crystal globe.

original: yi ge ga dkar po shel gong ltar dkar ba bsams te/_de 'od du zhu ba las lha🔽tshhogs kyi bdag po/_sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/_glang po
analyzed: yi ge ga dkar po shel gong ltar dkar ba bsams te/_de 'od du zhu ba las lha tshhogs kyi bdag po/_sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/_glang po
translated: That melts into light and from it you arise as🔽Amoghapāśa, white with one face and four arms.🔽He has the head of a great elephant, one tusk broken,

original: che'i mgo can/_mche ba ya cig chag pa/_phyag g.yas dang po na dgra sta/
analyzed: che'i mgo can/_mche ba ya cig chag pa/_phyag g.yas dang po na dgra sta/
translated: holding in the first right hand a sword,

original: 'og ma na la phug_g.yon dang po na kha tam rtshe gsum/_'og ma thod pa rin po
analyzed: 'og ma na la phug_g.yon dang po na kha tam rtshe gsum/_'og ma thod pa rin po
translated: in the lower right a hatchet, in the first left a khaṭvāṅga,🔽and in the lower left a skull cup filled with jewels.

original: ches gang ba bsnams pa/_lhu tshhigs thams cad rin po ches brgyan pa/_byi
analyzed: ches gang ba bsnams pa/_lhu tshhigs thams cad rin po ches brgyan pa/_byi
translated: All the joints are adorned with jewels.

original: la'i khri la g.yas brkyang bzhugs pa gcig bskyed do/_/de nas lag pa g.yon pa'i khu
analyzed: la'i khri la g.yas brkyang bzhugs pa gcig bskyed do/_/de nas lag pa g.yon pa'i khu
translated: Visualize him sitting on a lotus throne with his right leg extended.🔽Then, holding your left hand in the crook of your left arm,🔽put the index finger behind the middle finger and,

original: tshhur bcangs te/_gung mo'i rgyab du mdzub mo btshugs la/_g.yas pa'i mthil du🔽gru mo gtshugs nas/_rang gi snying kha nas 'od zer 'phros pas/_ri rab kyi rtshe
analyzed: tshhur bcangs te/_gung mo'i rgyab du mdzub mo btshugs la/_g.yas pa'i mthil du gru mo gtshugs nas/_rang gi snying kha nas 'od zer 'phros pas/_ri rab kyi rtshe
translated: with your elbow resting on the palm of your right hand,🔽imagine that light rays radiate from your heart, inviting the great god Ganapati from the peak of Mount Meru.

original: mo nas/_lha chen po tshhogs bdag spyan drangs par bsams la/_mdun skyed la
analyzed: mo nas/_lha chen po tshhogs bdag spyan drangs par bsams la/_mdun skyed la
translated: Think that he dissolves into the front visualization.

original: stim mo/_/de nas bzlas pa byas te/_om pa ra ta ka swa ha/_zhes pa nye ba'i
analyzed: stim mo/_/de nas bzlas pa byas te/_om pa ra ta ka swa ha/_zhes pa nye ba'i
translated: Then, do the recitation: Om parata ka svaha.

original: snying po de 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na/_'dzam bu'i gling gi nor thams cad
analyzed: snying po de 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na/_'dzam bu'i gling gi nor thams cad
translated: This is the essence mantra. If you recite it one hundred thousand times,🔽all the wealth of Jambudvipa will come to you and you will become rich.

original: 'ongs te phyug por 'gyur ro/_/om b+ha ga wa te/_e ka damsh+ta bin+d+ha hu~m phat/_rgyas
analyzed: 'ongs te phyug por 'gyur ro/_/om b+ha ga wa te/_e ka damsh+ta bin+d+ha hu~m phat/_rgyas
translated: Om bhagavat ekadamshtravindhya hum phat.

original: pa'i thugs sam snying gi snying po'o/_/de bzlas nas zla ba drug mchod pa byas na/
analyzed: pa'i thugs sam snying gi snying po'o/_/de bzlas nas zla ba drug mchod pa byas na/
translated: This is the essence of the essence of the heart of the expanded heart. If you recite it for six months and make offerings,

original: mi'i mtha' yang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/om bye ga na pa ti
analyzed: mi'i mtha' yang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/om bye ga na pa ti
translated: The limit of human beings is to become a universal monarch.🔽Om bhage na pati🔽ye svaha. This is the essence of the name.

original: ye swa ha/_zhes pa ming gi snying po'o/_/de zla ba gcig bzlas na/_skyes pa
analyzed: ye swa ha/_zhes pa ming gi snying po'o/_/de zla ba gcig bzlas na/_skyes pa
translated: If one recites it for one month, all men,

original: dang bud med dang rgyal po dang btshun mo la sogs pa thams cad bdag gi dbang
analyzed: dang bud med dang rgyal po dang btshun mo la sogs pa thams cad bdag gi dbang
translated: women, kings, queens, and so forth will come under one's power.

original: du 'gyur ro/_/dam tshhig tu chos la gnas par bya'o/_/'phags pa tshhogs kyi
analyzed: du 'gyur ro/_/dam tshhig tu chos la gnas par bya'o/_/'phags pa tshhogs kyi
translated: As a pledge, one should abide in the Dharma.

analyzed: bdag po yid bzhin nor bu'i bsgrub thabs/_rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug brtul
translated: The Sadhana of the Noble Lord of the Ganas, the Wish-Fulfilling Gem,

analyzed: zhugs spyod pa nag po pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//
translated: is complete.

analyzed: shin tu zab par 'dug ste/_spyan snga rnal 'byor gyi zhal nas/_nga la mgon po
translated: It is very profound, and the yogi in front said,

analyzed: dang nor lha mang po yod de/_'di las myur ba mi 'dug gsung ngo /_/
translated: I have many protectors and wealth deities, but none are swifter than this.🔽The Translation
